footer.aboutMe: I am a front-end developer with over 2 years of experience. I obtained a bachelor's degree in web development in Tallinn. Experience working in teams and effectively collaborating with colleagues. Able to adapt to different working styles and tasks. Value openness, honesty, and professionalism in communication.
